nature of work
testing and commissioning of all kind of protective relays of alstom, abb and schneider make. design and making of settings calculations for protection relays. testing and commissioning of all electrical equipment s in 11kv, 33kv, 66kv, 220kv, 400kv and 765kv systems.
inspection of control and relay panel, preparation of test report and cable schedule for sub-station and power plant.
testing and commissioning of control and relay panel for bus bar, transformer, generator, motor, bus coupler and line feeder.
knowledge of transformer protection, reactor protection, busbar protection, motor protection and synchronizing scheme.
testing of power control centre and motor control centre. testing of ct, vt, cvt, circuit breaker, switch gear and power transformer. trouble shooting of all electrical circuits, control circuits and protection circuits. domestic assignment for power plants and substations
